ygData.subject: Re: Crude Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: The Crude Stein comes off of that wily killer of good folks, Bouncer Hurd. You can find him in Feerrott. Good luck killing him. ... From: kale usi
ygData.messageBody:
The Crude Stein comes off of that wily killer of good folks, Bouncer Hurd.
You can find him in Feerrott. Good luck killing him.

----- Original Message -----
From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 1:15 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Crude Stein


> From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>
>
> I've been questing for a Crude Stein for approximately 1 month now, and
I've
> still yet to find one. Does anyone know for sure where you can get one, or
> which quest you can get them from? I'm even willing to buy one from
someone
> (on the Bertoxxulous server) and will discuss the price if you have one
for
> sale.
>
>
